definitions.text: ellipse in which the two axes are of equal length; a plane curve generated by one point moving at a constant distance from a fixed point
examples: he calculated the circumference of the circle

definitions.text: an unofficial association of people or groups
something approximating the shape of a circle
examples: the chairs were arranged in a circle
he drove an extra lap just for insurance

definitions.text: a road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island
examples: the accident blocked all traffic at the rotary

definitions.text: a curved section or tier of seats in a hall or theater or opera house; usually the first tier above the orchestra
examples: they had excellent seats in the dress circle
the machine punched out metal circles
